query.statement:
SELECT '' FLAG ,IRUM ,DPT ,JIKMU ,GRADE ,COUNT(PSPID) AS CNT ,CASE WHEN COUNT(PSPID) > 0 THEN '지정' ELSE '대기' END AS GBN FROM ( SELECT A.IRUM ,A.DPT ,A.JIKMU ,A.GRADE ,B.PSPID FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0144 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0145 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.IRUM = B.IRUM AND A.DPT = B.DPT AND A.JIKMU = B.JIKMU AND A.GRADE = B.GRADE AND B.STATE = '1' WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND A.IRUM LIKE '%'||#IRUM#||'%'
AND A.DPT = #DPT#
AND A.JIKMU = #JIKMU#
AND A.GRADE = #GRADE#
) AS T WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY IRUM,DPT,JIKMU,GRADE
HAVING COUNT(PSPID) > 0
HAVING COUNT(PSPID) = 0
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
